title: Spaghetti Bolognese
summary: A rich, flavorful Italian pasta with a hearty meat sauce.
description: Classic spaghetti with homemade bolognese sauce made from ground beef, tomatoes, and herbs.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Sauté onions and garlic, then add minced beef and cook until browned.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti and garnish with basil.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A creamy, mildly spiced chicken curry perfect with rice or naan.
description: Tender chicken cooked in a flavorful curry sauce made with coconut milk and spices.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic until golden.
Add curry powder and chicken, cooking until browned.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple and healthy avocado toast topped with fresh herbs.
description: Crispy toast spread with mashed avocado, lemon juice, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
instructions: Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mixture on toast and top with chili flakes.
